item.title: Node.js CLI Tool for Content Migration
item.description: Overview A powerful Node.js-based CLI tool for automated content migration between legacy CMS systems. Capabilities Folder traversal and file extraction JSON â†’ TypeScript model auto-generation HTML cleanup and sanitization Bulk migration with progress tracking Error logging and retry functionality Responsibilities Designed CLI structure using Commander.js Implemented file system utilities Automated Blade/HTML cleanup functionality Added support for dynamic component generation Tech Stack Node.js, Commander.js, TypeScript, FS module.
